reviewText: Click the screen and throw money at a fully clothed stripper while dodging various objects like male dancers, opposums, and coils of ♥♥♥♥. Achievements also seem to be broken. Trophies (awards) reset when you leave. Not a damn thing of value, even for $.83 cents (sale price).\n\n*Update: According to a response to my community post inquiring about the achievement issue, the developer has stated that the achievements were removed and will be put back in for the next update*

reviewText:
SHOW ME THE MONEY!

Shake your money
At the nice little honey.
Throw it to the moll
Dancing on the pole.

Roll in your coin
And she'll shake her groin.
Chuck in a buck
And she'll run amuck.

Give her some cash
To cure that rash.
Share your wealth
To help with her health.

Spend lots of dough
On the little dancing ho.
Pay her to grind and twitch
And make the b*tch rich!

(I used amuck"
recommended:
so that the rhyme would be obvious to all.)


ABOUT THE GAME:

It should be obvious from the very start that "Shake Your Money Simulator 2016" is basically a silly
voteText: clicker game
helpfulPercent:
which is based upon throwing cash at pole dancers in some sleazy joint.

This game can only be recommended on the basis that it is very cheap (under a dollar) and that people realise how stupid it is.
There is a minimal amount of skill needed to play this game. But I will include some tips anyway.


TIPS:

Click your mouse to throw cash at the pole dancer.
Make sure you are in range
votesHelpful: or else your money thrown won't count towards your total.\nThe more money she gets
votesTotal: the higher the percentage will grow in the bar at the bottom of the screen.\nAt 100%
votesFunny: you get a bronze award; at 500%
column16:
gold.
There is a timer in the bottom left of the screen. Each session goes for 120 seconds.

Avoid everything falling from the ceiling; except for the dollar signs with the rainbow tails
column17: as they give your cash a multiplier effect. If you are hit
column18: you will be stilled for a few moments.\nThe more rainbow dollars you catch
column19:
the more your multiplier effect will increase.
The worms that emerge out of the floor will damage your multiplier effect.

Watch out for bullets that are fired from the side of the stage. If you are hit
column20:
you will be stilled for a few moments.
Bullets can be avoided by ducking.

The keys A and D will move you left and right
column21: whilst S will make you duck.\n\nBy the way
column23: silver and bronze trophies") does not work.\nThere have been several complaints about this.\nThe start screen shows the number of trophies that you have - I have more than 10 of each
column24: and have not received that achievement either.\nHowever
column25: 0.7% of peole have attained that achievement
column26:
so maybe there is a catch in the way it should be done (e.g. maybe it can only be achieved with one particular character in the game).
The developer really needs to fix that issue.

"Shake Your Money Simulator 2016" is not a serious game.
It is obviously a dumb
column28: and crass game - so only buy it on that basis."
